page.title: 03Local Groups in Whittlebury
page.content: Various groups are well established in the rural community of Whittlebury meeting at the Reading Room, the pub or in private homes. The Women's Institute has 50 members of mixed ages and demonstrations, talks and other activities are numerous. Mums and Toddlers meet weekly and Keep Fit meets twice weekly. A Horticultural Society was formed 7 years ago to benefit those keen on any aspect of gardening. It has 45 members. The church and chapel support Sunday Schools, Bible Study and Mother's Union. A youth club for 10-16 year olds offers various activities both in and out of the village. There is a weekly Bingo session and an Over 60's group. The pub has a darts team and a ladies darts team and also a Folk Club.
